meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unkind.
meanings.sent1: Her unkindliness towards others made them feel sad.
meanings.sent2: His unkindliness was evident in the way he spoke to his classmates.
meanings.sent3: Despite her unkindliness, she always had a smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: The unkindliness in the room was palpable, creating a tense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The unkindliness of the bully left a lasting impact on the victim.

meanings.sent1: The unkindliness of his words hurt her feelings deeply.
meanings.sent2: She was taken aback by the unkindliness of his gesture.
meanings.sent3: The unkindliness of the situation was quickly forgotten with a kind apology.
meanings.sent4: The unkindliness of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: His unkindliness towards animals was a cause for concern among his friends.
